comments.comment:
What the government really should understand is that the opposition parties are looking for surge in violence. The main problem here is the president who doesn't care what happens to the country because he knows he will not win the presidential election. It is my way or the high way. 

The government needs to force him to appoint someone who can stop this nonsense. The government cannot go on like this without a person with the backbone to question those who paid these criminals and supported them, they are feeling that things are moving the way they planned.

By the way, the Cardinal needs to take care of himself without taking any risk to his life because of prophets of God were advised to arm themselves against the devilish people. In the name of Muslims, any bankrupt political party could harm him. Actually, people are fed up with the president‚Äôs indifference. to appoint a competent person to deal with it. We can not afford to impose a curfew on and off and now and then,
comments.author: Truthprevails

comments.comment: Cardinal Malcolmm we solemnly promise we will stand by you on all dangers.You have led an exemplary life.You showed us the leadership when there were no proper leaders in the country.We are very very sad for what had happenned.never in my life we ever dreamt that a peaceful christian community in SL would ever come under attack.

comments.comment: May the Triple Gem bless you beloved Cardinal! You are the only leadership that stood by the aching souls affected by the Easter attack and by the side of all Sri Lankan‚Äôs. You took a great big step which the country‚Äôs leaders should have taken but you took it with courage and you stood by the side of the people of Sri Lanka irrespective of religion. This is love for humanity in action this is love for the motherland this is leadership! Not even one of our spineless cowardly politicians are even close to one quality of your love and leadership. They stood back while you stepped out and voiced on behalf of the people and prevented a possible bloodshed that would have been even continuing till today!  You have saved millions of lives that could have got easily blinded by the events and run to the streets for a battle. God shower His blessings and protection over you! We are so blessed to have you in our lives and please keep spreading the truth because your words are the most valid than any politician who are nothing but a bunch of lies! They have betrayed us and we don‚Äôt even want to see their faces. May the triple gem protect you dear Cardinal!
comments.author: Zarah Jazmy
